data.comment: The match has started.
Goal! Seung-Woo Lee gives St. Truidense a 1-0 lead in Sint- Truiden.
In the minute 1, Facundo Colidio instrumental with a fine assist.
Simen Juklerod is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Great play from Faris Haroun to set up the goal.
In the minute 23, Goal! St. Truidense have got their heads in front thanks to a Seung-Woo Lee strike.
That's a fine assist from Mory Konate.
Chris Durkin is booked for the home team.
In the minute 33, Goal! Antwerp draw level to 2-2 through a Abdoulaye Seck header.
Simen Juklerod with an assist there.
Dylan Batubinsika (Antwerp) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Staaien.
The second-half is underway in Sint- Truiden.
Faris Haroun (Antwerp) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 62, Antwerp make their first substitution with Koji Miyoshi replacing Lior Refaelov.
The away team replace Ritchie De Laet with Junior Pius.
Mory Konate for St. Truidense has been booked by Wim Smet and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 72, Dylan Batubinsika in Antwerp has been yellow-carded a second time by Wim Smet and is being sent off.
Samuel Asamoah is on a sub for Mory Konate for St. Truidense.
Koji Miyoshi (Antwerp) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 81, Kevin Muscat (St. Truidense) is making a second substitution, with Duckens Nazon replacing Santiago Colombatto.
Tatsuya Ito is replacing Facundo Colidio for the home team.
Simen Juklerod puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 2-3.
In the minute 89, Red card in Sint- Truiden! Mory Konate has been shown a second yellow card by Wim Smet.
Full-time! The final score is 2-3.
